mapper.select: SELECT a.id, a.money FROM sys_eve_user_staff_capital a WHERE a.staff_id = #{staffId} AND a.month_time = #{monthTime}
mapper.insert: INSERT into sys_eve_user_staff_capital (id, staff_id, company_id, department_id, month_time, money, type, state, create_time) VALUES (#{id}, #{staffId}, #{companyId}, #{departmentId}, #{monthTime}, #{money}, #{type}, #{state}, #{createTime})
mapper.select:
SELECT b.company_name companyName, c.department_name departmentName, a.month_time monthTime, FORMAT(SUM(a.money), 2) monthAllMony FROM sys_eve_user_staff_capital a, company_mation b, company_department c WHERE a.company_id = b.id AND a.department_id = c.id AND a.type = 1
AND b.company_name LIKE '%${companyName}%'
AND c.department_name LIKE '%${departmentName}%'
AND a.month_time = #{monthTime}
GROUP BY a.month_time, a.department_id ORDER BY a.month_time ASC
